doc.after: The character of Fitzwilliam Darcy has appeared in and inspired numerous works in a variety of genres and mediums. He and Elizabeth are featured in Philip Jose Farmer's 'Wold Newton family' and Pamela Aidan's Fitzwilliam Darcy, Gentleman trilogy, among others; Helen Fielding has admitted she "pillaged her plot" for Bridget Jones's Diary from Pride and Prejudice, developing the character of Mark Darcy (played by Colin Firth, who also played Fitzwilliam Darcy in the 1995 production). (more...)
